net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset

Interface IDataset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataset, ArffDataSet, FileDataset, KeelDataSet

    public interface IDataset
extends net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure
    Dataset interface. Defines the main methods to handle the data instances and metadata information.
    Author:
    Amelia Zafra, Sebastian Ventura
